channel.title: CEH on Chris Clarkson
channel.description: Recent content in CEH on Chris Clarkson

item.title: CCSP
item.description: The Gold standard for Cloud security professionals, I would advise anybody working in Cloud Security to do this course. Its benefit lies in understanding, as a techie I gained a deeper understanding and appreciation of how the Policy and process side of Cloud Security works.

item.title: CISSP
item.description: The Gold standard for information security professionals, I would advise anybody working in IT Security to do this course. Its benefit lies in understanding, as a techie I gained a deeper understanding and appreciation of how the Policy and process side of Security works.

item.title: CEH - Certified Ethical Hacker
item.description: An excellent introduction to the ways a hacker works to compromise a system. Despite it being widely disparaged by the Cybersecurity community, I found it to be insightful and good all-round introductory course. There are some questions around the dubious title and the format of the exam, but content is valid and useful especially for someone without a background in offensive security.
